mapper.sql: V_CATEGORY_ID, PARENT_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, STATUS, LEVEL, IS_RECOMMEND, ADD_TIME, IS_DEL, CREATOR, MOD_TIME, UPDATER, CATEGORY_ID, PLATFROM_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from V_CATEGORY
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into V_CATEGORY (V_CATEGORY_ID, PARENT_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, STATUS, LEVEL, IS_RECOMMEND, ADD_TIME, IS_DEL, CREATOR, MOD_TIME, UPDATER, CATEGORY_ID, PLATFROM_ID) values (#{vCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{platfromId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into V_CATEGORY
V_CATEGORY_ID,
PARENT_ID,
CATEGORY_NAME,
STATUS,
LEVEL,
IS_RECOMMEND,
ADD_TIME,
IS_DEL,
CREATOR,
MOD_TIME,
UPDATER,
CATEGORY_ID,
PLATFROM_ID,

#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update V_CATEGORY
V_CATEGORY_ID = #{record.vCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARENT_ID = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CATEGORY_NAME = #{record.categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEVEL = #{record.level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_RECOMMEND = #{record.isRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADD_TIME = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DEL = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{record.creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MOD_TIME = #{record.modTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{record.updater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CATEGORY_ID = #{record.categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PLATFROM_ID = #{record.platfromId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update V_CATEGORY set V_CATEGORY_ID = #{record.vCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PARENT_ID = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CATEGORY_NAME = #{record.categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEVEL = #{record.level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_RECOMMEND = #{record.isRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADD_TIME = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DEL = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{record.creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MOD_TIME = #{record.modTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{record.updater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CATEGORY_ID = #{record.categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PLATFROM_ID = #{record.platfromId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update V_CATEGORY
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_RECOMMEND = #{isRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MOD_TIME = #{modTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PLATFROM_ID = #{platfromId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where V_CATEGORY_ID = #{vCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update V_CATEGORY set PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_RECOMMEND = #{isRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MOD_TIME = #{modTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PLATFROM_ID = #{platfromId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where V_CATEGORY_ID = #{vCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT cat.V_CATEGORY_ID as vCategoryId, cat.PARENT_ID as parentId, cat.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName, cat.STATUS, cat.LEVEL, cat.IS_RECOMMEND as isRecommend, cat.ADD_TIME as addTime, cat.IS_DEL as isDel, cat.CREATOR as creator, concat('http://',att.DOMAIN,att.URI) as url
FROM V_CATEGORY cat LEFT JOIN T_ATTACHMENT att ON cat.V_CATEGORY_ID=att.RELATED_ID and att.ATTACHMENT_TYPE=403 and att.ATTACHMENT_FUNCTION=23 where PARENT_ID = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and IS_DEL=0 AND PLATFROM_ID = 1
AND IS_RECOMMEND=1
order by cat.sort
SELECT V_CATEGORY_ID as categoryId, CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName FROM V_CATEGORY where LEVEL = 3 and IS_DEL=0 AND PLATFROM_ID = 1
SELECT V_CATEGORY_ID as categoryId, CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName FROM V_CATEGORY where LEVEL = 3 and V_CATEGORY_ID=#{categoryId} AND PLATFROM_ID = 1

SELECT vc.V_CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId, vc.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, ta.DOMAIN, ta.URI AS url FROM V_CATEGORY AS vc LEFT JOIN T_ATTACHMENT AS ta ON ta.RELATED_ID = vc.V_CATEGORY_ID WHERE vc.`STATUS` = 1 AND vc.`LEVEL` = 3 AND IS_DEL = 0 AND PLATFROM_ID = 1 LIMIT #{random},8
